name: DELIVER / PROCESS Workflow Template
description: Executes delivery work, runs tests, and sets tests_pass TRUE when criteria are met.
inputs: job.stage MUST equal DELIVER and job.subflow MUST equal PROCESS.
Guards MUST remain TRUE; job.halted MUST be FALSE; lock MUST be active; tests_pass MUST currently be FALSE.
DELIVER INGEST notes MUST outline work streams and owners.
Operator MUST confirm tooling + environments (Windows + WSL) are configured.
steps: Execute build/test tasks per spec; capture commands, environments, and outputs in test_log.
Record PlusCal-like pseudocode references (if any) inline with docs; no other pseudocode formats are allowed.
Set tests_pass TRUE only after all required tests pass and evidence is stored in test_log.
Update build_path or deliverables with version/timestamp information for OUT stage.
outputs: test_log describing executed tests, environments, and pass/fail status.
Updated deliverables under build_path ready for packaging.
acceptance: All mandatory tests MUST be executed on Windows/WSL as applicable.
Evidence MUST show commands, timestamps, and outcomes for each test case.
tests_pass MUST equal TRUE before advancing to OUT.
